Title: WPF : Styling a Combobox, Button and a TabItem
Description: WPF Styles project shows how to create styles for Combobox, Tabltem and Button. Ready to use styles. Can be modified. Created in VB.net(loading the style file).

Project Description
WPF Styles project shows how to create styles for Combobox, Tabltem and Button. Ready to use styles. Can be modified. Created in VB.net(loading the style file).


Summary

This project is solely made for the purpose of sharing WPF Styles so that one doesn't have to fight hard for setting up styles like I had to. I am not highly skilled in WPF, but somehow I managed to create few styles. I thought to share it with community and it could save time for bunch of people. Suggestions are WELCOME.
